Class PAGMovie

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.libpag.PAGImage

  • public class PAGMovie
extends PAGImage

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      long duration()
      Returns the duration of this movie in microseconds.
      static PAGMovie FromComposition(PAGComposition composition)
      Creates a PAGMovie object from a PAGComposition object, returns null if the composition is null.
      static PAGMovie FromVideoPath(java.lang.String filePath)
      Creates a PAGMovie object from a path of a video file, return null if the file does not exist or it's not a valid video file.
      static PAGMovie FromVideoPath(java.lang.String filePath, long startTime, long duration)
      Creates a PAGMovie object from a specified range of a video file, return null if the file does not exist or it's not a valid video file.

        public static PAGMovie FromVideoPath(java.lang.String filePath,
                                     long startTime,
                                     long duration)
        Creates a PAGMovie object from a specified range of a video file, return null if the file does not exist or it's not a valid video file.
        Parameters:
        startTime - start time of the movie in microseconds.
        duration - duration of the movie in microseconds.
